price: ߕߎ߬ߡߊ ߡߍ߲ ߌ ߡߊ߰ߙߌ ߞߊ߬ ߡߎߛߊ߫ ߞߟߌ߫ ߸ ߞߏ߫ ߕߊ߯ ߡߌ߬ߙߌ߲߬ߘߌ߫ ߕߐ߬ߢߍ߰ߒߕߋ ߟߎ߫ ߕߘߍ߬
arabic: وَإِذۡ نَادَىٰ رَبُّكَ مُوسَىٰٓ أَنِ ٱئۡتِ ٱلۡقَوۡمَ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: wa-idh nādā rabbuka mūsā ani i'ti al-qawma al-ẓālimīna
